document_data.name: Ilitmur Auglad
document_data.deathnotes: slain by unknown archmageThe exact date of his death is not provided; it is known to have happened at least some years after 293 DR, and at some point before or during 297 DR. Thus, as some years should be at least two, the date is assumed to be between 295 DR and 297 DR.
document_data.mainbody: '''Ilitmur Auglad''' was a survivor of [[Netheril]], who was thousands of years old by {{yearlink|290}}, having gone into a wizard's tower to live in. At some point between {{yearlink|293}} and {{yearlink|297}}, he began a romance with the [[Magister]] [[Nasana Melnuthquel]] after she snuck into his wizard's tower. She lived with him for some years, until someone seeking to challenge her for the position of the Magister broke into his tower and slew him. He was at the time so feeble that he had become a thing of magic more than man.
